c74object.name: tap.zerox~
c74object.digest: Count zero crossings in a signal
c74object.description: The tap.zerox~ object counts the number of zero crossings in a signal within a set number of samples. It can be useful as a rough but CPU-friendly frequency tracker.

attribute.name: size
attribute.description: Sets the length of the analysis in samples.

entry.name: signal
entry.description: Trigger when a zero-crossing has occured.
